main.name: Justin Miller
main.description: Full Stack Developer looking for the next opportunity to solve problems with code.
main.bio: Thoughtful, disciplined, and detail-oriented software developer who enjoys identifying problems, and finds solving them rewarding. My previous area of expertise has been working in the financial services industry; however, I am open to working with established subject-matter experts in other areas to discover new industries. Looking forward to working with new companies, no matter what the size, and continuing a lifelong journey of learning.  Myers-Briggs Type Indicator: INFJ.  Predictive Index Behavioral Assessment: Operator.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details!

education.description: 12-month innovative technical certificate in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, React, Python, and Django.
Received a graduate certification in marketing during my accelerated 2-year program.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Public Affairs
education.description: Achieved a minor in Criminal Justice and was selected for the 6-month Washington Leadership Program.

work.title: Software Engineering Coach
work.description: Foster an atmosphere of learning among students for a different programming language every 3 months.

testimonials.text: Justin is smart, thoughtful and diligent with expertise in both front end and backend development. He will be a great addition to any dev team.
testimonials.user: Danielle McDowell, Director of Placement - Kenzie Academy
